comments.author: suzanne5223
comments.body: The site looks nice and simple. However, you need to get a copper membership as was previously advised so you can have a brand boosting Ann thread.If you're planning a campaign advertisement on this forum just like Crypton Exchange is currently doing you can contact me ad I will be glad to assist.
